description1: Selecting this would qualify you as an LOADER OR UNLOADER who is a recognized participant in the chain of responsibility and come under NHVR Compliance.

title1: Engages Owner Drivers on a permanent basis
description1: Selecting this would qualify you as an PRIME CONTRACTOR who is a recognized participant in the chain of responsibility and come under NHVR Compliance.

title1: Received goods delivery by heavy vehicles
description1: Selecting this would qualify you as an CONSIGNEE who is a recognized participant in the chain of responsibility and come under NHVR Compliance.

title1: Packs or Assembles goods for transports in a heavy vehicle
description1: Selecting this would qualify you as an PACKER who is a recognized participant in the chain of responsibility and come under NHVR Compliance.
